author: amaltaro
body:
[description updated]
Build python3 dbs3-client and dbs3-pycurl client from PyPi (which uses the freshly created new repositories as well).

This needs to be tested because there might be issues related to certificates.

Note that, if we stick to this tag, it also breaks backwards compatibility and our source code needs to be updated as well. Issue being discussed in https://github.com/dmwm/DBSClient/issues/17
title: Build Py3 dbs3-client from PyPi
